tip: Drink a glass of water before every meal. It aids digestion and helps you feel full, preventing overeating.
Take the stairs instead of the elevator. It's a simple way to incorporate more physical activity into your day.
Aim for 7-8 hours of quality sleep per night. Sleep is crucial for muscle repair, memory consolidation, and overall health.
Incorporate colorful vegetables into your meals. Different colors signify different nutrients and antioxidants.
Practice mindful eating. Pay attention to your food, chew slowly, and savor each bite to improve digestion and satisfaction.
Swap sugary drinks for water, herbal tea, or black coffee to significantly reduce your daily sugar intake.
Take a 5-minute stretching break for every hour you sit. It helps prevent stiffness and improves blood circulation.
